bibl.title: Alexandria no século I a.C.: uma ameaça a Roma no Mediterrâneo? [Alexandria in the first century B.C.: a Mediterranean threat to Rome?]
bibl.note: Examines how some events of the 1st cent. B.C. brought the first emperors to view Alexandria as a focus of problems. - Avec résumés en portugais et en anglais.

bibl.title: Mare Nostrum. Estudos sobre o Mediterrâneo Antigo

bibl.seg: Joana Campos Clímaco, Alexandria no século I a.C.: uma ameaça a Roma no Mediterrâneo? [Alexandria in the first century B.C.: a Mediterranean threat to Rome?]
Mare Nostrum. Estudos sobre o Mediterrâneo Antigo 3 (2012) pp. 104-114.
Examines how some events of the 1st cent. B.C. brought the first emperors to view Alexandria as a focus of problems. - Avec résumés en portugais et en anglais.
